title.text: A PREFERENCE MECHANISM BASED ON MULTIPLE CRITERIA RESOLUTION

entities.text: A PREFERENCE MECHANISM BASED ON MULTIPLE CRITERIA RESOLUTION

abstractContent.text: This paper presents an experimental preference tool des!gned, implemented and tested m the Eurotra pro)ect.
The mechanism is based on preference rules which can either compare subtrees pairwise or single out a subtree on the basis of some specified constraints.
Scoring permits combining the effects of various preference rules.
